description: Common Tag RDF vocabulary, described using W3C RDF Schema. Common Tags allows documents and document fragments (any resource which can be identified by a URI) to be labeled with keywords and URIs, unambigiously idenfying the concepts covered by the resource.
label: Common Tag vocabulary

AuthorTag.description: A Tag asserted by the author of a content resource.
AuthorTag.label: Author Tag

Tag.description: A Common Tag associating a URI and a keyword to annotate a resource.
Tag.label: Tag

AutoTag.description: A Tag asserted by an automated tool on a content resource.
AutoTag.label: Auto Tag

ReaderTag.description: A Tag asserted by the reader (consumer) of a content resource.
ReaderTag.label: Reader Tag

TaggedContent.description: Content which has one or more Common Tag.
TaggedContent.label: Tagged Content

isAbout.description: A resource (URI) representing the concepts described by the content.
isAbout.label: is about

label.description: A local, human-readable name for a Tag.
label.label: 标签

means.description: A a resource (URI) representing the conceptual meaning of a Tag.
means.label: means

tagged.description: Links a resource to a Common Tag.
tagged.label: 标签

taggingDate.description: The date the Tag was assigned.
taggingDate.label: tagging date
